Text:
Here is a great military news site.
http://www.pleatousmilitary.org
Please stop posting your antisemitic nonsense, samjoeXX

It is a site of Active Duty/Retired U.S. Military, Law Enforcement and Veterans.  There are no topics even talking about people in the middle east.   There is talk about Obama making false promises and where Veterans make up 25% of the homeless population in America. 

jwhitt62 You are clearly cointelpro or a fool for name calling on a patriot site.

I assume ALL your posts are antisemitic, sorrrrrry. In other words, go someplace else, Jew-Hater!!! One of my best friends is Jewish and he had direct relatives die in the Holocaust. So go f**k yourself.
I'm probably a bigger supporter of the military than you are. I talked to a recruiter after 9-11 about joining but I was too old (almost 40). He suggested civilian employment.
..and I don't know...but...being "COINTELPRO" wasn't all bad.
